body.name: Yaheetech Queen Bed Frame Solid Pine Wood Platform Bed with Paneled Headboard, Wicklow Style/Wooden Slats Support/Noise-Free/7.5 inch Space Underneath/No Box Spring Need/Easy Assembly, Wood Queen Bed
features: 【Sturdy Slats for Strong Support】This entire robust bed base is constructed of a solid wood frame for a high load-bearing capacity of 794 lb. The reliable frame features 26 wood slats spaced 3″ apart, offering optimal support to the mattress and sleepers.

【Sleep Solution, Peaceful Nights】Meticulously constructed using durable hardwoods, our wooden bed frame eliminates the risk of flimsy slats that may warp, snap, or provide inadequate support, ensuring that you can rest peacefully, free from any concerns.
【7.5″ Space Underneath】Cleaning becomes effortless with a 7.5-inch clearance space underneath the wood platform bed that allows vacuum cleaning robots to pass through easily.

【No Box Spring Needed】Reliable and closely spaced wood slats are designed to support and extend the life of your latex, memory foam, or spring mattress without needing a box spring. You can easily and comfortably rest your mattress on its trusty wood platform for impeccable support.

【Intuitive Instructions】All the necessary hardware and handy tools come within this platform bed frames package, including a clear, straightforward instruction manual. Two adults can finish the setup within 45 minutes with the help of intuitive assembly instructions and the included tools.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Introducing a timeless and traditional pine bed frame featuring a captivating horizontal slatted and hollow headboard design. This modern classic exudes an everlasting appeal that never goes out of style. Crafted from 100% solid pine wood, the bed frame comes with reinforced center supporting legs, providing optimal support for both the mattress and sleepers. The slats boast a 3-inch spacing, ensuring ample give for shock absorption and ventilation, guaranteeing a comfortable sleep experience. If you have latex, memory foam, or spring mattress, they perform exceptionally well on wood support compared to any type of box spring. Embrace this exquisite bed frame that seamlessly blends modern aesthetics with classic charm, ensuring a perfect addition to your bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together and great quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Read the product dimensions before buying
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for an inexpensive bed frame, I think this is a great option. We got this bed due to the low price point and the natural wood color. The bed itself, once built is pretty low to the ground, which could be fine without a box spring because the support slats are quite strong (unlike other cheap slat supports). Each slat has to be individually attached, though. The headboard is really short. The mattress we put on top is a thicker pillow top queen and once all the pillows are on, the height is pretty much the same as the top of the headboard. The bed also has a smell that needs to air out once the bed is put together. We left the windows open for a few days as a result since we were expecting company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bed for my 4 year old. My husband put it together in less than an hour. It’s cute. Simple. What we needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It not even
reviews.reviewText: I would’ve returned it but it’s such a hassle to break it apart and send it back but be aware that it’s not even. I had to put something under one of the legs to make it even. Terrible!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plain but sturdy
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for a plain platform bed, this one is great. Installation took a while, but it is very sturdy and my daughter loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the bed and the unfinished wood. It was easy enough to put together, but it took me 3 hours by myself. I would purchase again. I wish it was maybe 3 inches higher. I am going to purchase bed lifts. If you do the same, you will need 7 due to the 3 supports under the bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, but a little low to the ground
reviews.reviewText: This is a sturdy, solid wood bed. No box spring needed. However, the bed itself is quite low to the ground for my taste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easiest Bed Frame To Assemble
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame was super easy to assemble, all the wood pieces are labeled with a number that correlates with the picture instructions! The assembly is pretty much fool proof if you read the instructions correctly. I was able to assemble it with a Phillips head screwdriver as my only additional tool! However, having a drill would've been nice for screwing in the slats! The bed frame seems super sturdy and works great with my queen mattress. A great purchase especially for the price!
